nls.description: A list of active roles for which the user has access. Includes Role Type field
nls.name: Active Roles Browse

dynamicLookup.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:RESOURCES.ID:ID@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.FULL_NAME:FULL_NAME@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.UNIQUE_NAME:UNIQUE_NAME@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID:RESOURCE_TYPE_ID@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE_CAPTION:RESOURCE_TYPE_NAME@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.ROLE_ID:ROLE_ID@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.ROLE_CAPTION:ROLE_NAME@ FROM ( SELECT SRM_RESOURCES.ID ID, SRM_RESOURCES.FULL_NAME, SRM_RESOURCES.UNIQUE_NAME, SRM_RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE RESOURCE_TYPE_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM CMN_LOOKUPS_V WHERE LANGUAGE_CODE = LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE AND LOOKUP_TYPE = 'RESOURCE_TYPE' AND LOOKUP_CODE = SRM_RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE) RESOURCE_TYPE_CAPTION, ROLES.ID ROLE_ID, ROLES.FULL_NAME ROLE_CAPTION, SRM_RESOURCES.IS_HIDDEN, SRM_RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE, LANG.ID LANGUAGE_ID, LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE LANGUAGE_CODE FROM SRM_RESOURCES JOIN PRJ_RESOURCES ON SRM_RESOURCES.ID = PRJ_RESOURCES.PRID LEFT OUTER JOIN SRM_RESOURCES ROLES ON ROLES.ID = PRJ_RESOURCES.PRPRIMARYROLEID, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG WHERE PRJ_RESOURCES.PRISROLE = 1 AND SRM_RESOURCES.DEFINED_TEAM_ID IS NULL AND LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ ) RESOURCES WHERE @WHERE:SECURITY:RESOURCE:RESOURCES.ID@ AND @FILTER@ @BROWSE-ONLY: AND RESOURCES.IS_HIDDEN = 0 AND RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE = 1 :BROWSE-ONLY@

SELECT @SELECT:RESOURCES.ID:ID@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.FULL_NAME:FULL_NAME@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.UNIQUE_NAME:UNIQUE_NAME@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID:RESOURCE_TYPE_ID@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE_CAPTION:RESOURCE_TYPE_NAME@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.ROLE_ID:ROLE_ID@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.ROLE_CAPTION:ROLE_NAME@ FROM ( SELECT SRM_RESOURCES.ID ID, SRM_RESOURCES.FULL_NAME, SRM_RESOURCES.UNIQUE_NAME, SRM_RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE RESOURCE_TYPE_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM CMN_LOOKUPS_V WHERE LANGUAGE_CODE = LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE AND LOOKUP_TYPE = 'RESOURCE_TYPE' AND LOOKUP_CODE = SRM_RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE) RESOURCE_TYPE_CAPTION, ROLES.ID ROLE_ID, ROLES.FULL_NAME ROLE_CAPTION, SRM_RESOURCES.IS_HIDDEN, SRM_RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE, LANG.ID LANGUAGE_ID, LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE LANGUAGE_CODE FROM SRM_RESOURCES JOIN PRJ_RESOURCES ON SRM_RESOURCES.ID = PRJ_RESOURCES.PRID LEFT OUTER JOIN SRM_RESOURCES ROLES ON ROLES.ID = PRJ_RESOURCES.PRPRIMARYROLEID, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG WHERE PRJ_RESOURCES.PRISROLE = 1 AND SRM_RESOURCES.DEFINED_TEAM_ID IS NULL AND LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ ) RESOURCES WHERE @WHERE:SECURITY:RESOURCE:RESOURCES.ID@ AND @FILTER@ @BROWSE-ONLY: AND RESOURCES.IS_HIDDEN = 0 AND RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE = 1 :BROWSE-ONLY@

SELECT @SELECT:RESOURCES.ID:ID@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.FULL_NAME:FULL_NAME@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.UNIQUE_NAME:UNIQUE_NAME@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID:RESOURCE_TYPE_ID@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE_CAPTION:RESOURCE_TYPE_NAME@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.ROLE_ID:ROLE_ID@, @SELECT:RESOURCES.ROLE_CAPTION:ROLE_NAME@ FROM ( SELECT SRM_RESOURCES.ID ID, SRM_RESOURCES.FULL_NAME, SRM_RESOURCES.UNIQUE_NAME, SRM_RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE RESOURCE_TYPE_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM CMN_LOOKUPS_V WHERE LANGUAGE_CODE = LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE AND LOOKUP_TYPE = 'RESOURCE_TYPE' AND LOOKUP_CODE = SRM_RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE@CASTAS@text) RESOURCE_TYPE_CAPTION, ROLES.ID ROLE_ID, ROLES.FULL_NAME ROLE_CAPTION, SRM_RESOURCES.IS_HIDDEN, SRM_RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE, LANG.ID LANGUAGE_ID, LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE LANGUAGE_CODE FROM SRM_RESOURCES JOIN PRJ_RESOURCES ON SRM_RESOURCES.ID = PRJ_RESOURCES.PRID LEFT OUTER JOIN SRM_RESOURCES ROLES ON ROLES.ID = PRJ_RESOURCES.PRPRIMARYROLEID, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG WHERE PRJ_RESOURCES.PRISROLE = 1 AND SRM_RESOURCES.DEFINED_TEAM_ID IS NULL AND LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ ) RESOURCES WHERE @WHERE:SECURITY:RESOURCE:RESOURCES.ID@ AND @FILTER@ @BROWSE-ONLY: AND RESOURCES.IS_HIDDEN = 0 AND RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE = 1 :BROWSE-ONLY@
